entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.4°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
